extracted_playbook.title: Remove INTERACTIVE Group from Folder Security
extracted_playbook.description: Remove the INTERACTIVE group from the security properties of the HMI projects folder to prevent unauthorized modifications.

extracted_playbook.title: Assign User Permissions to HMI Projects Folder
extracted_playbook.description: Add specific users or user groups to the HMI projects folder and assign appropriate permissions. Consider assigning read-only permissions to limit modifications.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult FactoryTalk View SE Help for Security Settings
extracted_playbook.description: In Version 14, open FactoryTalk View Studio and navigate to Help -> FactoryTalk View SE Help -> Security -> 'HMI projects folder' for detailed security settings.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet to minimize exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the latest version.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation.
